custom-action.name: KeyType - DOWN_ARROW_180
custom-action.description:
This Action sends a key with an optional list of modifiers.
Possible parameters are: - keyCode (required): KeyCode from the following: [LEFT_ARROW, UP_ARROW, RIGHT_ARROW, DOWN_ARROW, ADD, MULTIPLY, SUBSTRACT, DIVIDE, ALT, BACKSPACE, SPACE, CAPSLOCK, CTRL, DEL, END, ENTER, ESC, F1, F2, F3, F4, F5, F6, F7, F8, F9, F10, F11, F12, HOME, INS, NUMLOCK, PAGE_DOWN, PAGE_UP, PRINTSCREEN, SCROLL, SHIFT, TAB, NUMPAD_0, NUMPAD_1, NUMPAD_2, NUMPAD_3, NUMPAD_4, NUMPAD_5, NUMPAD_6, NUMPAD_7, NUMPAD_8, NUMPAD_9, WINDOW_LEFT, WINDOW_RIGHT]. - modifiers (optional): Comma separated modifiers from the following: [ALT, CTRL, SHIFT, EXTENDED].
